foods.ingredients: CRUST: WHITE WHOLE WHEAT FLOUR, WHOLE WHEAT FLOUR, WATER, SUGAR, SOYBEAN OIL, YEAST, SALT, DOUGH CONDITIONERS (MONOGLYCERIDES WITH PROPIONIC ACID, PHOSPHORIC ACID, WHEAT FLOUR, GARLIC POWDER, SODIUM STEAROYL LACTYLATE), ASCORBIC ACID. FILLING: LOW FAT MOZZARELLA CHEESE (PASTEURIZED SKIM MILK, CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES, VITAMIN A PALMITATE), WATER, TOMATO PASTE, ALL NATURAL UNCURED PEPPERONI, CONTAINS NO NITRITE OR NITRATES ADDED EXCEPT NATURALLY OCCURRING NITRATES IN CELERY AND SEA SALT (PORK, BEEF, SALT, CONTAINS 2% OR LESS OF: NATURAL SPICES, DEXTROSE, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, NATURAL FLAVORING [INCLUDING CELERY], OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA), RESISTANT MALTODEXTRIN, SUGAR, MODIFIED FOOD STARCH, PIZZA SEASONING (SPICES, ONION POWDER, SALT, GARLIC POWDER, CITRIC ACID, MALIC ACID, MODIFIED CORN STARCH, NATURAL FLAVORS, EXTRACTIVES OF TURMERIC, LESS THAN 2% SOYBEAN OIL AS A PROCESSING AID), ROMANO CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES). TOPPING: BASIL, ROMANO CHEESE (PASTEURIZED PART-SKIM MILK, CHEESE CULTURE, SALT, ENZYMES), PAPRIKA.
foods.allHighlightFields: Ingredients: , CULTURES, SALT, ENZYMES, VITAMIN A PALMITATE), WATER, TOMATO PASTE, ALL NATURAL UNCURED PEPPERONI

foods.ingredients: COOKIE: BLEACHED ENRICHED WHEAT FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, ASCORBIC ACID ADDED AS A DOUGH CONDITIONER, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, ENZYME, FOLIC ACID), SUGAR, VEGETABLE OIL SHORTENING (CANOLA OIL, FRACTIONATED PALM OIL, FRACTIONATED PALM KERNEL OIL), WATER, INVERT SUGAR, EGGS, NONFAT DRY MILK, SODIUM BICARBONATE (LEAVENING), NATURAL AND ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, SALT. ICINGS: SUGAR, WATER, PALM OIL, HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP, CORNSTARCH, MODIFIED CORNSTARCH, CONTAINS LESS THAN 1% OF: SALT, ACETYLATED MONOGLYCERIDES, ARTIFICIAL FLAVOR, POLYSORBATE 60, POTASSIUM SORBATE (PRESERVATIVE), CITRIC ACID, BLUE 1, YELLOW 5, YELLOW 6, RED 40. LEMON DROPS: SUGAR, CORN SYRUP, CITRIC ACID, LEMON OIL, YELLOW 5. CANDY SEQUINS: POWDERED SUGAR, PALM KERNEL OIL, MODIFIED CORNSTARCH, CORNSTARCH, CONFECTIONER'S GLAZE, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, POLYSORBATE 60, YELLOW 5, YELLOW 6, BLUE 1, RED 40.

foods.description: PEPPERONI PIZZA SLICED PEPPERONI LAYERED WITH MELTED MOZZARELLA CHEESE & GARLIC TOMATO SAUCE IN A CRISPY SEASONED CRUST STUFFED SANDWICHES, PEPPERONI PIZZA
foods.lowercaseDescription: pepperoni pizza sliced pepperoni layered with melted mozzarella cheese & garlic tomato sauce in a crispy seasoned crust stuffed sandwiches, pepperoni pizza
foods.ingredients: UNBLEACHED ENRICHED FLOUR (WHEAT FLOUR, MALTED BARLEY FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID), WATER, MOZZARELLA CHEESE ([PASTEURIZED MILK, CHEESE CULTURES, SALT, & ENZYMES], POWDERED CORN & POTATO STARCH [ADDED TO PREVENT CAKING], NATAMYCIN [NATURAL MOLD INHIBITOR]), PEPPERONI (PORK AND BEEF, SALT, SPICES, DEXTROSE, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN OF PAPRIKA, FLAVORING, SODIUM NITRITE, BHA, BHT, CITRIC ACID), TOMATO PASTE, CONTAINS LESS THAN 2% OF: FULLY HYDROGENATED SOYBEAN OIL, PALM OIL (WITH SOY LECITHIN, NATURAL FLAVOR, BETA CAROTENE), SUGAR, FULLY HYDROGENATED PALM KERNEL OIL (WITH SOY LECITHIN), SEASONED BREAD CRUMBS (ENRICHED FLOUR [WHEAT FLOUR, NIACIN, REDUCED IRON, THIAMINE MONONITRATE, RIBOFLAVIN, FOLIC ACID], DEHYDRATED GARLIC, TOMATO POWDER, SALT, DEXTROSE, ONION POWDER, MALTODEXTRIN, DEHYDRATED PARSLEY, CORN SYRUP, SUGAR, CITRIC ACID, YEAST, SODIUM STEAROLYL, LACTYLATE, CALCIUM PROPIONATE [PRESERVATIVE]), DOUGH CONDITIONERS (CALCIUM SULFATE, SALT, L-CYSTEINE HYDROCHLORIDE, DEODORIZED GARLIC POWDER, TRICALCIUM PHOSPHATE, FUNGAL ENZYMES, MONO-AND DIGLYCERIDES, WHEY, ETHOXYLATED MONO- AND DIGLYCERIDES, WHEAT FLOUR), SEASONING (GARLIC POWDER, SALT, SUGAR, ONION POWDER, SPICE, CITRIC ACID), MODIFIED CORN STARCH, DRIED EGG YOLKS, SALT, NATURAL PEPPERONI FLAVOR, YEAST, DRIED WHEY, SOY FLOUR, DRIED EGG WHITES, POWDERED CELLULOSE.
foods.allHighlightFields: Ingredients: INHIBITOR]), PEPPERONI (PORK AND BEEF, SALT, SPICES, DEXTROSE, LACTIC ACID STARTER CULTURE, OLEORESIN
